sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Replace every occurance of one string with another. The general syntax for its use is p = strrep(source,find,replace) Every instance of the string find in the string source is replaced with the string replace. Any of source, find and replace can be a cell array of strings, in which case each entry has the replace operation applied.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here are some examples of the use of strrep. First the case where are the arguments are simple strings

para.verbatim:
--> strrep('Matlab is great','Matlab','FreeMat')
ans = FreeMat is great

sect1.para: And here we have the replace operation for a number of strings:

para.verbatim:
--> strrep({'time is money';'A stitch in time';'No time for games'},'time','money')
ans = [money is money] [A stitch in money] [No money for games]
